title: Issue with DirectX out of no where?
body:
Hello everyone,

I booted up league to play a game and after being in the lobby I got this message before ever getting into game.

Any advice? This is a brand new issue, though my lag has been getting steadily worse up until this point.

-Onwodori

replies.body: First double check that you've got the latest graphics driver updates for your card, as well as making sure to update DirectX as well. If that's not helping, make sure you go through the other steps in the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and let me know what seems to help or not help.
